Thanos 🔥

I completed the six weeks of my internship at Cloud Native Computing Foundation with Thanos under the mentorship of Bartek Plotka and Povilas Versockas ğŸ¤— â¤ï¸

In this blog post, I want to share my experience and progress report of the last two weeks (i.e 5th and 6th week) ğŸ¤—.

WORK DONE :

Targets

  1. Completed the basic structure of the tutorial.
  2. Delete unused code and dependencies from the files.
  3. Fixed container rendering bugs ğŸ.
  4. Improved the structure, content and design of the tutorial â€œDownsampling and unlimited metric retention for Prometheusâ€.

PLANS FOR THE NEXT WEEK :

After 1:1 meeting with Bartek Plotka and Povilas Versockas, we decided to re-structure the tutorial ğŸ¥±.

  1. Convert 2 Prometheus servers into 1 Prometheus server, and similarly 1 Object Storage, 1 Thanos Store.
  2. Add Thanos Compactor in the tutorial to show the retention capabilities ğŸ’ªğŸ».
  3. Remove Downsampling from the tutorial ğŸ¤”.

As Povilas says â€œUnorganized stuff is the best ğŸ˜‚, always make a mess and then try to make it look goodâ€.

Many excited things coming soon with the tutorial ğŸ˜»

Stay Tuned ğŸ˜‰

Signing off for today, until next week ğŸ‘»
